name: Masuteru Aoba
biography: Masuteru Aoba graduated from the Kuwasawa Design Research Institute in 1962 and later established his own design agency. Aoba was renowned for his creation of protest posters geared toward environmental and non-violent activism. He created a strong visual message by paredpairing slogans with simple, poetic imagery and bold colors. Through this work he sought to encourage a more compassionate and peaceful society. His work became internationally recognized through awards from national competitions as well as international exhibitions such as  Trnava Poster Triennial and the International Poster Biennale of Warsaw and ADC Awards New York.
